document_data.name: Sense Treason
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sense treason''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[ninja]]s. The spell was very rare outside [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell allowed the caster to determine if their clan or family had been intentionally betrayed. The identity of the traitor or the exact details of the betrayal remained unknown to the caster. Since the spell had no range limits, the spell was not always accurate. The spell was most often used by the [[shinobi]] advisors of clan leaders.
document_data.Components: The spell required only a [[somatic component|somatic]] component, [[kuji-kiri]] hand gestures.
